=== Group management ===

DB schema changes for group management:
{{{
ALTER TABLE users_to_groups ADD host_permissions BIT(8) NOT NULL REFERENCES permissions(id) ON DELETE RESTRICT DEFAULT '00001111';
}}}

=== DNS record management ===

DB schema changes for DNS record management:
{{{
UPDATE dns_types SET min_permissions = '00000000';
UPDATE dns_types SET min_permissions = '00000100' WHERE id IN (1, 5, 12, 15, 16, 33);
}}}
